emails.subject: Welcome to Our Platform!
emails.snippet: Thank you for joining us! We're excited to have you on board. Get started by exploring our features...
emails.body:
Hi there,

Thank you for joining our platform! We're thrilled to have you as part of our community.

Here are some quick tips to get started:
1. Complete your profile
2. Explore our dashboard
3. Connect with other users

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team.

Best regards,
The Team

emails.subject: Password Reset Request
emails.snippet: We received a request to reset your password. Click the link below to create a new password...

Hello,

We received a request to reset your password for your account.

If you made this request, click the link below:
https://accounts.com/reset/abc123xyz

This link will expire in 1 hour.

If you didn't request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.

Best regards,

emails.subject: Re: Question about API Documentation
emails.snippet: Thanks for reaching out! Here's the information about our API endpoints...
emails.body:
Hi,

Thanks for your question about our API documentation.

The endpoints you're looking for are documented here:
https://docs.devtools.com/api/v2

For authentication, you'll need to use OAuth 2.0. Here's a quick example:

```
POST /oauth/token
Content-Type: application/json
{
  "client_id": "your_client_id",
  "client_secret": "your_secret"
}
```

Let me know if you need any clarification!

Best,
Dev Support Team

emails.subject: Security Alert: New Login Detected
emails.snippet: We detected a new login to your account from Chrome on Windows in New York, USA...
emails.body:
Security Alert

We detected a new login to your account:

Device: Chrome on Windows
Location: New York, USA
IP Address: 192.168.1.100
Time: November 25, 2024 at 6:15 AM EST

If this was you, no action is needed.

If you don't recognize this activity, please secure your account immediately:
1. Change your password
2. Review recent activity
3. Enable two-factor authentication

Stay safe!

emails.subject: Project Deadline Extended
emails.snippet: Good news! The deadline for the Q4 project has been extended to December 15. Here's what this means...
emails.body:
Hi Team,

I have good news - the Q4 project deadline has been extended to December 15th.

This gives us additional time to:
- Conduct thorough testing
- Address edge cases
- Improve documentation
- Polish the user interface

Let's use this extra time wisely. We'll maintain our regular sprint schedule.

Next standup: Monday 9 AM

Thanks for your hard work!
Michael

emails.subject: Your Code Review is Ready
emails.snippet: Pull request #342 has been reviewed. 3 comments and 1 change request...
emails.body:
Pull Request Update

Repository: company/main-app
PR #342: Add user authentication feature

Reviewer: @senior-dev
Status: Changes Requested

Comments:
- Great implementation overall
- Please add unit tests for the login flow
- Consider handling edge cases for expired tokens

View full review: https://github.com/company/main-app/pull/342

Reply to this email or comment on GitHub.
